name: Web Search Tools
description: Real-time web search using Groq's compound model. Search the internet and get summarized answers with citations.

tools.description: Perform real-time web search and return summarized answer with citations
tools.use_when: User needs current/real-time information from the web, recent events, or answers that require internet search
tools.not_for: Wikipedia facts (use wiki_tools), stock prices (use finance_tools), news articles (use news_tools)

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The question or topic to search for

parameters.name: include_domains
parameters.description: Optional list of domains to restrict search to

parameters.name: exclude_domains
parameters.description: Optional list of domains to exclude from search

tools.returns: Dictionary with answer, sources, and original query
example_queries: Search the web for latest iPhone reviews
Find information about upcoming SpaceX launches
What are the best restaurants in NYC?
Research the current state of renewable energy
